link_desc:
Powershell script that can be used to monitoring Windows Server Failover Cluster. Zabbix's Low-level Discovery (LLD) protocol are supported.

Note script can be used with Zabbix 2.0, but template provided for Zabbix 2.4 only.

Help to get/sum/count metric values of:

  • Cluster;
  • ClusterNode;
  • ClusterNetwork, ClusterNetworkInterface;
  • ClusterSharedVolume, ClusterAvailableDisk;
  • ClusterResources: Generic Service, Virtual Machine, IP Address, Physical Disk, SQL Server and other;
  • ClusterQuorum.

You can also get some complex metrics like Total used memory in cluster or Number of VM's in online pending state.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active|Custom Script
author: sadman
